com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovableObject

    abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game object.

    The GameObject class that everything visible in the game is derived from. Contains texture and positional information.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[] animation_regions
      The array of frames used for animations, stored as TextureRegion s
      protected java.lang.Boolean is_shown
      Used to determine if the object should be rendered or not.
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite
      Stores the texture of the object and positional information (x and y coordinates, width and height, rotation)
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture
      Stores the image rendered when the object is shown.

      • getBounds

        public CollisionBounds getBounds()
        Returns a new collision bounds object for the GameObject.

        Creates a new collision bounds object representing the current position of this GameObject. See the collision bounds visualisation folder in assets for a visual representation.

        Returns:
        CollisionBounds object of GameObject

      • setAnimationFrame

        public void setAnimationFrame(int i)
